urlencoded.value: North & Central Vietnam Easy Adventure for Family with Kids 10 days

Your family will have an easy journey to explore the colorful cultures and fascinating nature of North and Central Vietnam on this 10-day vacation. Begin with an exhilarating Jeep tour through Hanoi and a pleasant excursion in Mai Chau. Then, relax with your kids on a Halong Bay cruise and join family-friendly activities in the pretty Hoi An.
Hanoi - Mai Chau - Halong Bay - Hoi An - Cam Thanh Village
Family with Kids, Young Adults, Seniors

formdata.value: Arrival at Noi Bai International Airport in Hanoi, and a BestPrice Travel guide will welcome you at Pole No.10 (Outside the Terminal Gate) and take you to your hotel by a 45-minute drive. The time for check-in is 14:00; if you require early check-in with a surcharge, please contact your travel consultant. After processing check-in, the rest is your leisure time.

Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum closes on Monday and Friday and renovates inside from June to August every year. During the renovation, visitors can't join the tour ceremony but still take pictures outside and visit the surrounding area.
Hotel (10 nights), Overnight on Cruise (1 night)
Overnight in shared Twin/ Double room with Air-condition (AC) at hotel.
Interact with local, Cultural, History, Nature
